name: Barbeque Battle Quest
description:
One fateful night the barbeque comes to life. With only one goal in mind - to grill the perfect burger. However, the Meat and Veg are defending themselves, and won't give in without a fight. Enter the Bullet Hell of the Backyard, skewer the ingredients and grill them to show them who's the boss in this epic Barbeque Battle Quest!

Credits: 

AAA level graphics artists: Malin Sandred, Natali Arvidsson, Isac Selander, Nikola Praizovic  Hedström, and Jovan Marinkovic.

Code and hilarious bugs: Theo Björkhem, Emil Nygren, Benediktas Vilkelis, Coco Myrén Hallström.

Leveldesigners & Shmup-masters: Alexander Berg, Max-Leonard Rydén och Isak Jansson.
